bropals.lib.simplegame.networking

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.networking.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the server-side of a basic client-server system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(int port, ServerMessageHandler messageHandler)
      Creates a new server at the specified port.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void broadcastMessage(ClientHandler sentMessage, java.lang.String message)
      Broadcast a message to all clients except for the one who sent it.
      void broadcastMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Broadcast a message to all clients including the one who sent it.
      void removeHandler(ClientHandler handler)
      Remove a ClientHandler from the server's list of handlers.
      void startServer()
      Has the server start to listen for clients.
      void stopServer()
      Closes the server so the Server doesn't accept any more clients.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int port,
              ServerMessageHandler messageHandler)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new server at the specified port.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to create the server
        messageHandler - the message handler that the server should use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if something goes wrong while making the server.

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        public void startServer()
        Has the server start to listen for clients. This thread may be blocked while the server listens for a new client.

      • broadcastMessage

        public void broadcastMessage(ClientHandler sentMessage,
                             java.lang.String message)
        Broadcast a message to all clients except for the one who sent it.
        Parameters:
        sentMessage - the one who sent the message.
        message - the message to broadcast.

      • broadcastMessage

        public void broadcastMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Broadcast a message to all clients including the one who sent it.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to broadcast.

      • removeHandler

        public void removeHandler(ClientHandler handler)
        Remove a ClientHandler from the server's list of handlers.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler being removed from the server's list of handlers.

      • stopServer

        public void stopServer()
        Closes the server so the Server doesn't accept any more clients. This method is called after startServer() is called to stop the server.
